Les Escaldes and Engordany are former villages and nowadays the parish of Escaldes-Engordany is only one city. ==Largest towns== Ranking Name Population 1 Andorra la Vella 19,319 2 Escaldes-Engordany 14,395 3 Encamp 8,470 4 Sant Julià de Lòria 7,518 5 La Massana 4,987 6 Santa Coloma 2,937 7 Ordino 2,780 8 El Pas de la Casa 2,613 9 Canillo 2,025 10 Arinsal 1,555 As of 2011-12-31, Source: CityPopulation == References == Category:Lists of cities in Europe Category:Lists of cities by country Category:Geography of Andorra
